Sarah’s face paled even further as an unmistakable aura of energy built around the two of them. An orb pulsed and grew at that point before plunging into Sarah in an instant. Sarah gave a startled gasp as the energy slammed into her and the candles went out.

The candles slowly relit, their glow bathing the room. Anna nibbled her lip as she wondered if everything had gone according to plan. Soon enough, the dim light revealed Sarah still lying there, but it was a far different Sarah than it had been. Sarah was now…

A chill crept into the area as the days turned into weeks. Anna ended up almost consumed by her desire to solve the enigma despite all the false leads and dead ends.
